name: com.publisher.swarmai
description: Multi-agent coordination system with swarm behaviors, formations, and emergent AI. Built from MIT Battlecode experience for RTS games, colony simulators, and AI-driven projects. Optional EasyPath integration for A* pathfinding.
_note: Remove underscore prefix and update URLs with actual documentation links before publishing

samples.description: Demonstrates boids-style flocking with separation, alignment, cohesion, and obstacle avoidance.
Showcases formation system with line, circle, wedge, V, and box formations.
RTS-style resource collection with gather, return, and deposit workflow.
